isis.stitle: International® T 444E Diesel Engine - Model Years Late 1997 to 2003 - Turbocharger - Removal - High Torque Turbocharger

step1.para: Remove air cleaner and pipe to the turbocharger compressor inlet.
Remove exhaust pipe between the turbocharger and the muffler.
Loosen and remove the two bolts securing the road draft tube to the back of the crankcase. Relocate road draft tube to gain access to the left side of the engine.

figure.caption: Removing Charge Air Cooling Tube/Crossover Pipe Assembly

step1.para: Remove turbocharger charge air cooling tube/crossover pipe assembly as follows:

step2.para: Loosen the four hose clamps (two per side) that secure the hoses to the air intake covers. The clamps are located on the manifold hoses.
Loosen the turbocharger compressor outlet clamp that secures the charge air cooling tube to the turbocharger compressor housing.
Remove the charge air cooling tube/crossover pipe assembly and the two manifold hoses.
Remove the turbocharger compressor outlet seal from the compressor housing.
Place protective caps onto the air intake manifolds.

step1.para: Remove and save turbocharger V-band clamp that secures the turbocharger to the exhaust outlet adapter. Remove seal.
Loosen and remove the two bolts that secure the turbocharger to the pedestal. Remove the turbocharger from the pedestal by lifting up.

note.para: The turbocharger and pedestal must be removed separately from the engine.

step1.para: Remove and discard the oil supply O-ring and oil drain O-ring located on the underside of the turbocharger or on the top of the pedestal.
Remove the four flange head mounting bolts that secure the pedestal to the crankcase. Remove the pedestal.

figure.caption: Turbocharger Oil Supply and Oil Drain Ports

step1.para: Remove and discard the two O-rings located on the turbocharger mounting pad.
Cap all openings on the turbocharger assembly. If plastic caps are not available, use duct tape to cover openings.

figure.caption: Turbocharger Exhaust Tube Mounting Hardware (Right Side Shown)

step1.para: Remove the exhaust tube mounting hardware at the left and right exhaust manifolds. Remove the exhaust inlet adapter and tube assemblies from the engine.
